"FOR GENTLEMEN ONLY: A Winter Catalog For Men"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Long-Sleeved Doublet\
3. Sleeveless Doublet\
4. Gauntlets\
5. Jerkin\
6. Longjohns\
7. Pants\
8. Long-Sleeved Shirt\
9. Short-Sleeved Shirt\
10. Sleeveless Shirt\
11. Tunic\
12. Undertunic\
13. Vest\
14. Overvest\
15. Codpiece\
16. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Clothesmakers guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Material, Fit, Color and Embroidering."
"A plain Long-Sleeved Doublet. One size fits all."
"A plain Sleeveless Doublet. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Gauntlets. One size fits all."
"A plain Jerkin. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Longjohns. One size fits all."
"A pair of plain Pants. One size fits all."
"A plain Long-Sleeved Shirt. One size fits all."
"A plain Short-Sleeved Shirt. One size fits all."
"A plain Sleeveless Shirt. One size fits all."
"A plain Tunic. One size fits all."
"A plain Undertunic. One size fits all."
"A plain Vest. One size fits all."
"A plain Overvest. One size fits all."
"A plain Codpiece. One size fits all."

"UPDATES\
\
New clothing items are always being commissioned by the Master Tailors of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
